import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function ProductScreen(props) { // const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); // props.match.. is the value at end of url - compare with item in prod array const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; return (
Back to results

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); }
